title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. III, pt. 35 - Administration Of Performance Rating
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. III, pt. 35 - Administration Of Performance Rating

State Regulations
§ 35.1 - Definition of terms
§ 35.2 - Applicability
§ 35.3 - Powers and duties of the civil service commission
§ 35.4 - Powers and duties of the department of civil service
§ 35.5 - Powers and duties of the agency
§ 35.6 - Performance rating board

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. III, pt. 35

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, §6
PREAMBLE
The purpose of this Part is to provide for periodic
evaluations of the performance and promotability of employees of the

State. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
